author: xtqqczze
body:
Fix [CA1019: Define accessors for attribute arguments](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca1019)

```
X:\src\System.Management.Automation\engine\Attributes.cs(1084,57): error CA1019: Add a public read-only property accessor for positional argument kind of Attribute ValidateRangeAttribute [X:\src\System.Management.Automation\System.Management.Automation.csproj]
X:\src\System.Management.Automation\engine\Attributes.cs(1719,42): error CA1019: Add a public read-only property accessor for positional argument valuesGeneratorType of Attribute ValidateSetAttribute [X:\src\System.Management.Automation\System.Management.Automation.csproj]
X:\src\System.Management.Automation\engine\CommandCompletion\ExtensibleCompletion.cs(259,61): error CA1019: Add a public read-only property accessor for positional argument completions of Attribute ArgumentCompletionsAttribute [X:\src\System.Management.Automation\System.Management.Automation.csproj]
```
title: Fix CA1019: Define accessors for attribute arguments
